5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Muhammad said:“I asked Anas bin Malik about Qunut, and he said: ‘The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) recited Qunut after Ruku’.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقُنُوتِ قَبْلَ الرُّكُوعِ وَبَعْدَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning reciting Qunut before Ruku’ or afterwards
